text: Grote Prijs Beeckman-De Caluwé is a single-day road bicycle race held annually in July in Ninove, Belgium. The 169 km race is named after the local cyclists Kamiel Beeckman and Edgard de Caluwé, winner of the Tour of Flanders (1938). ==Winners== ==External links== * Official Website * Results GP Beeckman-De Caluwé Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1943 Category:1943 establishments in Belgium Category:Cycle races in Belgium
title: Grote Prijs Beeckman-De Caluwé
